Name: SOP_POWER_DOWN_RACK_01
Title: Rack Power-Down Sequence
Description: Standard procedure for safely powering down the main rack container to prevent data loss and equipment damage.

Name: SOP_POWER_UP_RACK_01
Title: Rack Power-Up Sequence
Description: Standard procedure for powering up the main rack container in correct sequence to avoid power surges.

Name: SOP_GENERATOR_STARTUP
Title: Generator Startup Procedure
Description: Safe startup procedure for backup generator including pre-flight checks and load management.

Name: SOP_GENERATOR_SHUTDOWN
Title: Generator Shutdown Procedure
Description: Safe shutdown procedure for backup generator including cooldown period.

Name: SOP_FIRE_RESPONSE_RACK
Title: Fire Response - Rack Container
Description: Emergency response procedure for fire in rack container including equipment shutdown and egress.

Name: SOP_INTRUSION_RESPONSE
Title: Perimeter Intrusion Response
Description: Response procedure for perimeter intrusion detection including LRAD activation and law enforcement contact.

Name: SOP_BATTERY_SOC_LOW
Title: Low Battery SOC Response
Description: Procedure for responding to low battery state of charge alerts including load shedding.

Name: SOP_NETBOTZ_TEMP_HIGH
Title: High Temperature Alert - Rack
Description: Response to high temperature alerts in rack container including Aircela activation and equipment checks.

Name: SOP_WORKSHOP_LOCKOUT
Title: Workshop Lockout/Tagout
Description: Lockout/tagout procedure for workshop equipment maintenance ensuring electrical safety.

Name: SOP_PV_ARRAY_INSPECTION
Title: Solar Array Monthly Inspection
Description: Monthly inspection checklist for PV array including cleaning and connection checks.
